name: meteo-weather-app
description: Self-hostable weather dashboard with AI features

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint && npm run lint:css
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:backend
scripts.lint:fix:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint:fix && npm run lint:css:fix
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend && prettier --write "*.md"
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check:frontend && npm run format:check:backend
scripts.security:audit: npm audit && cd frontend && npm audit && cd ../backend && npm audit && cd ..

author: Michael Buckingham
